mapper.select: select a.totalWalks, b.totalJoins, c.notJoin, d.todayPuppy from (select count(*) totalWalks from walk) a, (select count(*) totalJoins from walk_join) b, (select count(*) notJoin from walk left join walk_join on walk.walk_idx = walk_join.walk_idx) c, (select count(*) todayPuppy from walk where walk_date=SYSDATE)d

select ROWNUM, a.*, b.walk_date from (select * from walk_join where member_number = #{member_number} and member_review is null)a, (select * from walk where walk_date<SYSDATE)b where a.walk_idx = b.walk_idx and ROWNUM=1 order by walk_date desc
select member_number from walk_join where walk_idx = #{walk_idx}
